sub_title: Seasoned Venture Builder, Entrepreneur, Private Equity Consultant
summary:
I have evaluated yearly more than 250 venture projects, ranging from €10K to  over €20 million.   I am an accomplished venture builder and startup founder who have been providing Entrepreneurship-as-a-Service for various companies since 2016 and I am open to growth opportunities that take me to the next level in my development. My purpose is making a vibrant future for all through innovative ventures. I am into the art and science of WORLD FUTURE-MAKING. I want to shake and shape status-quo institutions with other free-spirited, open-minded people who want to make this a better world. My means for impact are words, visual communication, data analysis, networks of like-minded people, problem-solving skills, visual, playfulness, humour and ability to develop specific startups (profit and non-profit) which offer radically new solutions to humankind. The world is under massive reconfiguration and we are evolving towards network societies. I want to contribute to a healthy governance of these networks. I want to empower people to live and act with freedom and flexibility.  I want to generate solutions which are global, and do not discriminate by gender, social status, ethnicity or nationality. I cannot imagine different worlds in one. We are one world. I want to reach not only few people, but billions. My geography is GLOBAL and I choose the beautiful world we live in, and from time to time, outer space. y biggest strength is my ability to BUILD BRIDGES  between people, cultures, disciplines, settings concepts, technologies and ideas, and defying established paradigms in creative ways. 
I am activist that works relentlessly to create an abundant society for all. Seasoned and resourceful venture builder, private equity consultant and entrepreneur - 15+ years of experience identifying market and technology opportunities, developing businesses and implementing organization and ecosystem-wide transformations in various industries, including, healthcare, energy, food and beverages, e-commerce. Demonstrated ability to consistently create value for portfolio of clients which include Bayer, Stanley Black and Decker, HP, Siemens, Aboitiz, Bitdefender, St.Gallisch-Appenzellische Kraftwerke AG, Accenture, EIT health, Dubai Supreme Council of Energy, the Constitutional Court of Colombia, Mobly, among others. Demonstrated ability of bringing to life lasting innovation and value creation. Strong experience in healthcare, energy and sustainability markets

awards.title: 1st Prize- FTI final stage to solve Air quality and mobility issues (Medellin)
awards.description: Developed a company and engaged with a strategic investor and client to pursue the initiative further

awards.title: Finalist, Singularity University 2017 MENA Global Impact Challenge
awards.description:
http://bit.ly/GICfinalist
Climate Change is making water scarcer, food less nutritious and air in urban areas more polluted. Households solutions available for these challenges are very limited. MENA region is already dealing with limited water access and dependency on saltwater desalination, high-reliance on food imports, and severely polluted air, and its situation will be severely aggravated. 
Flowhack tackles these challenges from a human-centric perspective  offering households decentralised water generation services, digitized air and water purification along with  real-time quality control and personalized food supplement supply through water. One device can meet a household’s drinking water requirements. 
Flowhack will use “Tom’s social entrepreneurship model” (Get water, give water) to impact the base of the pyramid too. The initiative will leverage existing low-cost harvesters of atmospheric water and develop solutions for agriculture gradually.
This household device harvests water out of thin-air and can customized the nutritional microcomponents of the water according to the personal needs of the in-taker. Real-time water and air data is captured by sensors in the device. Additional data on nutritional specific individual requirements are collected through a vitamin and mineral wearable tracker. Algorithms are used to support the customer data analysis. Then personalized insights & recommendations are provided through digital interfaces creating an entirely new experience for water consumption, vitamin intake and air monitoring.
This decentralized solution increases resilience of households to deal with air, water and nutritional challenges exacerbated by Climate Change, and makes legacy solutions redundant, reducing the use of bottled-water, the impact of plastic and brine in oceans and capital for water infrastructure.

awards.title: Full Scholarship - Caixa Galicia
awards.description: One year full scholarship for graduate studies in Cambridge (UK)

awards.title: Fulbright scholarship for graduate studies
awards.description: Declined to it since I was already engaged in a graduate study in Cambridge University (UK). It was a hard decision and appreciate the recognition received through this emblematic award.

profile_positions.title: Venture BUILDER & TRANFORMATION CONSULTANT

profile_positions.description:
Evaluate new business models and ventures, conduct financial modeling, perform venture valuation, and carry out commercial due diligence
Empowered teams to identify, validate and launch exponential business opportunities through sprints, advisory calls, workshops, disruption panels. Created and tested prototypes, MVPs as a means to test, learn and validate/pivot. Commercialization: Developed GTM strategy, explored multiple launch paths and exit opportunities. Recruited managed, and mentored members of the core team
Facilitated product innovation leading to IPO exit (e.g. Instagram feed-sales for Mobly)
Evaluated  over 250 venture projects yearly, and assessed investments ranging from €10K to over €20 million. Developed algorithm to calculate "exponential quotient" to estimate potential of initiatives  
* Led over 40 venture creation projects with market leaders in security, health, construction, banking & other industries leveraging disruptive techs (i.e. 3D printing, nanotechnology, biotech, food, energy, etc).  * Platform businesses, dashboard, user flow, etc  * Coached/advised teams/key individuals in various organisations in tech & business.  * Portfolio development * Conceptualised dashboard & NLP-model for the Colombian Constitutional Court to classify fundamental right violation cases & extract policy insights.  
Led planning phase from inception to launch. Developed GTM strategy, explored multiple launch paths and exit opportunities. Recruited managed, and mentored members of the core team, creating a high performance, innovative, collaborative, continuous learning culture. 

Clients: HP, VISA, TDAmeritrade, Stanley Black and Decker, Bitdefender, Dusit, Boston Scientific, Vodacom

profile_positions.description:
I am building exponential organizations and ventures to transform the world with innovative and radically new solutions for humanity. How? There is a new way to do management consultancy, one which goes beyond powerpoint slides and invites the client to have an immersive experience on the disruptive force of exponential technologies and business creation. This is a contextual learning methodology. Are you thinking about adopting cutting-edge technologies that will shape the future? How are you going to adopt these techs in context? We can help with a proven methodology for agile value creation to be ahead of the game in this ever changing world. Transforming business and driving the emergence of an exponential mindset.
Example of my work- Leading fabulous teams to transform a $11 billion annual revenue company around new techs and business trends. 

You may contact me @ luciana.ledesma@consultant.exo.works if you are interested in running a ExO Sprint
https://vimeo.com/226560117
C-level and Board-level advisory
